record.dc:title: 10MCL6, 15MCL6, McLean County, Kentucky. Eaton Site. Soil Profile.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Mississippian Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: This photograph taken at an oblique angle to southeast of profile indicates the plowline, Level #1, and the undisturbed subplowline topsoil beneath Level #1. The postholes indicated should all penetrate through Level #1 and constituted the first indications of the postholes of the South corner of Feature #3. From notes: Weather -- sunny and clear. Adjustments -- f 32 and 1/2 sec. Subject -- 65' profile showing Level #1 below plowline and considered disturbed soil. (Posthole of Feature #3 may show in floor of 65-70' trench). Scope -- L-6 - R-3.
